fields.name: Id
fields.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

fields.name: Properties
fields.description: Packet capture session properties. Packet capture file(s) derived from the name of this session will be uploaded to the Storage Account Container URL in the packet core control plane properties

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"
